newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese bonds end lower, await 5-yr auction.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese bonds end lower, await 5-yr auction.

text.p: 1640 GMT - Portuguese bonds ended lower with French election still weighing.Attention to focus on 5-yr bond auction tomorrow.
*Feb 07 cash 101.10 vs 101.40, yield 6.46 pct vs 6.42 pct
*Spread vs Spanish 10-yr cash -17 bps vs -14 bps
